SEARCH
Package HMS.src.ui

Class DoctorUI

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.ui.DoctorUI
public class DoctorUI extends Object
The DoctorUI class provides an interface for doctors to manage their schedule, handle patient appointments, and update medical records.

      Retrieves the logged-in doctor's name.
